fields.description:
Description:
The UI elements in KS Base UI > Views > scroll views > scrolling tabs are drawn so slowly that you can perceive the draw start location and the UI element looks painted in from one side. On the LG Slate, there is a couple second delay before the UI elements are rendered, and they may appear piecemeal, or all together with no perceptible drawing process.

Steps to reproduce:
1) Install KS on device
2) Navigate to Base UI > Views > scroll views > scrolling tabs
3) Watch as the UI elements render

Result:
Delay in some cases, slow draw in all others.

Expected:
Quick rendering of UI elements with no delay in render start
fields.summary: Android: Scrolling tabs: v8/Rhino: Slow UI element rendering or delay in rendering
